title: Seriously giving Akali TRUE stealth?
body:
Towers and True Sight abilities/ultimates cannot reveal her?

Well, I know who I'm perm banning when her rework goes live.


I seriously didn't think CertainlyT could do any worse than Zoe....



Here's the video -

Not just towers.


The intended counter play to stealth champions like {{champion:84}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:91}} is True sight.

If you take away that counter play from what appears to be an extremely high damage assassin, you're asking for trouble.


She needs to be revealed by Towers and True sight like she is on LIVE servers right now.

You can easily justify making her weaker in other areas as a tradeoff for the true stealth, and to be honest her current one doesnt feel that impactful as she just runs her target down and kills them right away anyhow when able.

Stealth rarely plays a great part aside from zoning i feel.

But i do agree that towers should still blow her new stealth however, otherwise it might truly become too difficult to balance.

I remember how Riot said they are working on Dynamic Queue and are yet to finish it. Everyone and their grandmothers were yelling this is shitt idea.
They rammed their ~~co... ~~I mean DQ update up our ~~asse.. ~~I mean clients
Guess what. It took them a whole year of clownfiesta to revert the shit they had caused. 

Now, about a champ: yeah a champ rework is alot "smaller" part of the game so they could change it a bit, but there's a catch..


It's CT baby. And anything he makes is fucking immune to changes. Nerf? Sure after a year or 3, but changing the kit of his baby? You can forget it.
CertainlyToxic at it again.
Why do they still let him do things....

About time CertainlyT stops designing champions. 

Yasuo, Zoe, this new Akali… the guy only designs gamebreaking weird things with 0 care about game balance.
You forgot new Warwick, which people applaud as one of the best reworks ever.

Warwick wasn't that hard to balance though, reworked Warwick is extremely similar to release Warwick, he was simply modernized. WW actually got damage reduction and a fear that he didn't have before, without losing much other than his passive being weaker and his AS boost being conditional. 



Don't get me wrong, new WW is one of the biggest rework success stories, but you can't use that one example to defend CertainlyT destroying game balance and making unbalanceable champions.
Going to perma ban her as long as towers don't reveal her. She will be way too good at tower diving, even in early levels.

Not only that she can't be seen by abilities that grant True sight.

* Fizz R
* Morgana R
* Vi R - 
* Caitlyn R and Traps
* Illaoi E
* Karma  R+W 
* Lee Q


What's the point of TRUE SIGHT if a champion's stealth mechanic is allowed to bypass it?

Wait for Rammus' rework!
With that trend going on, his W will be able to reduce true damage from now on. :^)
And Dr. Mundos healing is completely unaffected by Grievious Wounds.

I think they probably should change the phrase "True Sight" to "Almost True Sight".

You could argue that the point of stealth is blown when there is a mechanic to bypass it as well, it goes both ways.

Especially given that hers is so location bound, i would honestly not care if Shaco was revealed but Akali "only" has that circle of hers and nothing more.

Giving her this "true stealth" justifies weakening her performance without it preventing scenarios like those that can happen now in which she just runs the target down with gunblade and Q, making it a much more vital mechanic for her to win fights. 


But i do think that hiding from towers is too much, unless they really hurt her in other areas, a lot.

You can go to enemy fountain and not get revealed.

Also did you see that dash range? As  big as camile's lol..

After reading comments : 

Oh it's from CertainlyT? AHAHAHAHHAAHHAHAHAHA ok bye, nice job keeping this guy
She already _had_ true invisibility.
**NOTHING** Reveals her in that state. Turrets give **TRUE SIGHT** But she can just enter the smoke and be fine.
If they release this I am finally quitting league.
Stealth, insane mobility, high sustain, oneshots after lvl 6..why every new champion/rework has to be like this now?

Just watched the video and HOLY S#*#!!! This may be the most broken champ (on paper) They've made since the beta! 

A true stealth, manaless, hybrid damage, self sustaining, "melee", burst assassin who has more mobility then Yasuo and Ekko combined!?

She even has a tiny amount of hard cc!

Looks like riot had really learned their lesson about  power budgets...


Edit: Just watched the teaser trailer and no, towers, pinks and fountain DON'T reveal her... This is not cool. This champion is VERY unhealthy in this form!

Again though, I'm just looking at her on paper. She may pop like a bubble at the slightest prick,  or have much longer cool downs then I'm imagining. I had similar thoughts the first time I saw Kai'sa's Ult; I figured it would have a much shorter CD. Even still... THIS is worse, this could become a balancing nightmare!
She'll be permaban if they release her with that true stealth. If she we can't suppress an assassin then there's a no counterplay. Also this dash range and this damage? This is not serious.
More cancerous mobility

You can literally put down shroud and walk around in their fountain.

> [{quoted}](name=Pika Fox,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mg5Ejkqc,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2018-07-16T14:12:14.596+0000)
>

It doesn't take a genius to see that a stealth that can ignore True sight and Towers is absurdly overpowered.

I think it needs to have more counter-play. I watched the video a few times and it is not going to work out. There is going to be too much outcry, especially if she is overpowered. Whether they decide to keep it or not, she is either going to be hated soo much like Yasuo or she is going to be banned every game. The Developer walks a very fine line between what is fair and unbalanced. Having permanent stealth is not balanced and fair to play against. At least with Eve you can see where she is.

Even if they add it to where it only gives a faint silhouette like the other assassins every couple secs inside of it, that is more balanced than straight up perma stealth. Perma stealth didn't work on Eve a few years ago and the entire stealth rework a few years ago was done for a reason. It's not fun to play against something you cannot kill or see . . . especially if the defensive itemization is bad as is.
Well, she definitely feels fun to play, but obviousLee, she'll be fucking cancer. Like everything CT makes.
